title: FS: NEW Large T206 Lot STILL 20+ Cards w/ Many SL'ers *PRICE DROP 11/26*

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Large T206 Lot STILL 20+ Cards w/ Many SL'ers *PRICE DROP 11/26*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale. Scans should accurately reflect the condition. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

M. Miller - $33
Seitz - $35
F. White (Houston) - $33

Pm sent on these 2 cards..
Overall (hands at waist) - $20
Perring (card on right) - $18
email sent.  I recommend Marc without reservation. He is exceptional and you and order with confidence.
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking and thanks, Todd, for the kind words :)

Good evening, Marc. PM incoming.

Bill
One more bump for a final price drop on all cards before I send these to eBay.  Thanks for looking!
I got my cards in, Marc. Thank you so much! I'll be scanning these tonight.
Bump for some further price reductions and updates.  Thanks for looking.
Further price reduction on all remaining cards.  Still quite a few SL'ers and a Cy Young remaining.  Thanks for looking!
